mapper.select: SELECT A.HGHRK_CD_ID, A.CD_ID, A.CD_NM, A.UP_CD_ID, A.MTLNG_CD_NM, A.CD_EXPLN, A.SORT_SN, A.PBADMS_STD_CD_YN, A.PBADMS_STD_CD_YN, B.CD_CHC_ID FROM TC_CODE A, TC_CODE_CHOICE B WHERE A.CD_ID = B.LWRK_CD_ID AND A.HGHRK_CD_ID = B.HGHRK_CD_ID AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HGHRK_CD_ID = #{hghrkCdId} AND A.UP_CD_ID = #{cdId} ORDER BY A.SORT_SN ASC
